Name: MPA1-S
Description: MP Series Audio monitoring unit, 1RU, passive internal stereo loudspeakers EOL - Limited stock.

Name: MPA1-MIX-8-V
Description: Simple 1RU audio mixing monitor, optimised for use in production environments: Front panel display with 16 Level Meters and Source Names. 8 x AES Inputs + 8 x Balanced Analogue inputs. 1 x Balanced Stereo Output, 1 x Front Panel Headphone Output, 8 x GPIO, Internal Loudspeakers, Internal PSU, Web-interface and SNMP Control. (Numbered front panel encoders) V Button layout numbered and labelled

Name: MPA1-Solo-8
Description: Simple 1RU audio  monitor: Front panel display with 16 Level Meters, Source Names and Audio Phase display. 8 x AES Inputs + 8 x Balanced Analogue inputs. 1 x Balanced Stereo Output, 1 x Front Panel Headphone Output, 8 x GPIO, Internal Loudspeakers, Internal PSU, Web-interface and SNMP Control.

Name: MPA1-MIX-SDI-V
Description: Simple 1RU SDI audio mixing monitor, optimised for use in production environments: Front panel display with 16 Level Meters, Source Names and Video confidence display. 2 x 3G/HD/SD SDI Inputs + 1 x AES3id input and 2 x  Balanced Analogue inputs. 1 x Balanced Stereo Output, 1 x Re-clocked 3G/HD/SD SDI Output and HDMI Output + 1 Front Panel Headphone Output, Internal Loudspeakers, Internal PSU, Web-interface and SNMP Control. (Numbered front panel encoders) V Button layout numbered and labelled

Name: MPA1-Solo-SDI
Description: Simple 1RU SDI audio monitor: Front panel display with 16 Level Meters, Source Names, Audio Phase  and Video confidence display. 2 x 3G/HD/SD SDI Inputs + 1 x AES3id input and 2 x Â Balanced Analogue inputs. 1 x Balanced Stereo Output, 1 x Re-clocked 3G/HD/SD SDI Output and HDMI Output + 1 Front Panel Headphone Output, Internal Loudspeakers, Internal PSU, Web-interface and SNMP Control.

Name: MPA1-Solo-IP
Description: NEW. Simple 1RU SDI and IP audio monitor: Front panel display with 16 Level Meters, Source Names, Audio Phase  and Video confidence display. 2 x 3G/HD/SD SDI Inputs + 1 x AES3id input and 2 x  Balanced Analogue inputs. 2 x SFP Cages for ST-2110 and ST-2022-6 or SDI over fiber SFP modules, 1 x Balanced Stereo Output, 1 x Re-clocked 3G/HD/SD SDI Output and HDMI Output + 1 Front Panel Headphone Output, Internal Loudspeakers, Internal PSU, Web-interface and SNMP Control.  See S2110 and S2022-6 options below for optional SFP modules.

Name: SAM-Q-SDI
Description: 1 RU Agile Audio Monitor providing seven different modes of operation, tailored for both engineer and operator use. 2 x High quality front panel displays, 2 x 3G/HD/SD-SDI inputs,  1 x AES 3id input, 1 x Balanced Audio Input Pair. 1 x reclocked 3G/HD/SD SDI output, 1 x HDMI output and 1 Balanced Analogue Output. Internal Loudspeakers, Internal PSU.  Optional MADI license (SAM-Q-MADI) adds 128 channels of MADI monitoring, mixing and measurement. Optional LOUDNESS licensed (SAM-Q-LOUD-LIC) adds 3 further Operational Modes and simultaneous Loudness Monitoring of up to 8 separate audio programs. Loudness from all 8 probes may be logged over an Ethernet network with InfluxDB and displayed using Grafana.

Name: SAM-Q-MADI
Description: 1 RU Agile Audio Monitor providing seven operational modes tailored for both engineer and operator use. 2 x High quality front panel displays, 2 x 3G/HD/SD-SDI inputs which can also be configured for MADI (providing 128 channels of MADI monitoring, mixing and measurement). 1 x AES 3id input, 1 x Balanced Audio Input Pair. 1 x reclocked 3G/HD/SD SDI output, 1 x HDMI output and 1 Balanced Analogue Output. Internal Loudspeakers, Internal PSU.  Optional Loudness licence option (SAM-Q-LOUD-LIC) adds 3 further Operational Modes to and simultaneous Loudness Monitoring of up to 8 separate audio programs. Loudness from all 8 probes may be logged over an Ethernet network with InfluxDB and displayed using Grafana.

Name: PAM1-MK2
Description: Precision Audio monitoring unit, 1RU, 2 x LCD displays for 16 channel simultaneous audio monitoring, metadata, setup menus, video confidence monitor. 2 x HD/SDI (1080p 60, 59.94 & 50Hz), Dolby D/E/DD+ decoding, EBU-R128, CALM compliant loudness measurement. 2 x stereo analogue, 4 x AES inputs, Internal loudspeaker system, external PSU, External Monitor SDI output,

Name: PAM2-MK2
Description: Precision Audio monitoring unit, 2RU, 2 x TFT LCD displays for 16 channel simultaneous audio monitoring, metadata, setup menus, video confidence monitor. 2 x HD/SDI (1080p 60, 59.94 & 50Hz), Dolby D/E/DD+ decoding, EBU-R128, CALM compliant loudness measurement. 6 x stereo analogue, 8 x AES inputs, Internal loudspeaker system, external PSU, External Monitor SDI output, Availability ex-stock

Name: AIB-2
Description: Stand alone interface unit - I/O: Serial (RS232/RS422), 8xGPI, 8xGPO, Ethernet.  Trigger and monitor SNMP/ASCII/HEX to and from GPI/GPO.

Name: AIB-3
Description: 1RU interface unit - I/O: Serial (RS232/RS422), 16xGPI, 16xGPO, Ethernet.  Trigger and monitor SNMP/ASCII/HEX to and from GPI/GPO.

Name: AIB-3-RP
Description: AIB-3 with redundant external power supplies.

Name: AIB-4
Description: 1RU interface unit - I/O: Serial (RS232/RS422), 16xGPI, 16xGPO, Ethernet.  Trigger and monitor SNMP/DTMF/Dial-up modem to and from GPI/GPO.

Name: EG-4
Description: IP Control Buddy - I/O Unit (No buttons) - I/O: Serial (RS232/RS422), 4xGPI, 4xGPO, Power over Ethernet. GPI & Serial to Ethernet Converter - mounts into the EB4X-RT 1RU panel or the EG4-RT, 19" rack tray that holds eight units. Unit operates on POE, power supply not included; optional external power supply order PS-IPCB.

Name: SPT-1
Description: Serial Control Pass through Extender. Extends and verifies serial VDCP to transport over IP infrastructure

Name: MDU-14B
Description: Power Standard Mains Distribution Unit, 14 way, resettable over current thermal breaker/switch, cable tie bar

Name: MDU-14B-32A
Description: 32A Power Standard Mains Distribution Unit, 14 way, overcurrent resettable breaker/switch, cable tie bar

Name: MDU-12-PAi
Description: Power Alert Mains Distribution Unit, resettable thermal overcurrent breaker/switch, 12 way IEC, 16 x GPI, ethernet output monitoring and alarms - email and SNMP. Networked Current and Power Factor measurement for each outlet and unit total. 16A Max.  Limited quantities available.

Name: MDU-12-PM
Description: Power Manager Mains Distribution Unit, resettable thermal over current breaker/switch, 12 way IEC, 16 x GPIs, ethernet output monitoring and alarms - email and SNMP, individually controlled latching relays, sequential & delay power up and power down.  Limited quantities available.

Name: MDU-12-PMi
Description: Power Manager Mains Distribution Unit, resettable thermal over current breaker/switch, 12 way IEC, 16 x GPIs, ethernet output monitoring and alarms - e-mail and SNMP, individually controlled latching relays, sequential & delay power up and power down. Network accessible Current and Power Factor measurement for each outlet.

Name: MDU12 PMi 32A
Description: 32A Power Manager Mains Distribution Unit, resettable over current breaker/switch, 12 way IEC, 16 x GPIs, ethernet output monitoring and alarms - e-mail and SNMP, individually controlled latching relays, sequential & delay power up and power down. Network accessible Current and Power Factor measurement for each outlet.
